lead_paragraph: Las Vegas could host a second U.S. race on the Formula One calendar in a few years' time but a deal has yet to be agreed, the sport's commercial supremo Bernie Ecclestone said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Ecclestone Says Las Vegas in Talks for F1 Race
headline.main: Ecclestone Says Las Vegas in Talks for F1 Race

snippet: Las Vegas could host a second U.S. race on the Formula One calendar in a few years' time but a deal has yet to be agreed, the sport's commercial supremo Bernie Ecclestone said on Friday....
